comment.author: 37408767@N03
comment._content: From old times people have used old material to create new ones. Sometimes it is sad, because the original one is completely out of contest and partly destroyed. Sometimes, too, it was the only way to find a little bit of it today

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
strangnet: Great you found and posted these recent photos, allowing us to compare. Thank you!

Zinaida Beaumont (Happy New Year): You're right about that! A lot of ancient objects - whole or fragmentary - have been preserved in that way. 

/Anna B.
